Uses of Class
game.Entity

    • Uses of Entity in game

      Subclasses of Entity in game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Ball
      This is the ball which is launched around in the game.
      class  ExplosionBot
      This class represents a robot which explodes when it dies.
      class  Hole
      This represents the specifications of the Hole for the game.
      class  Mob
      This is the mob class that defines the robots as far as rendering and physics.
      class  StandardBot
      This class represents the standard robot settings along with extending the Mob class.
      class  Wall
      This class represents specifications of Wall.
      Methods in game with parameters of type Entity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Wall.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      Hit method created when a hit is detected by another entity.
      void Mob.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      Hit method used to decrement health when hit by ball object.
      void Hole.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      Hit method created to play sound if ball entity hits hole.
      void ExplosionBot.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      this is the hit method that removes health and robot when health is down to zero.
      abstract void Entity.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      Abstract hit method.
      void Ball.hit(Entity otherEntity)
      Required as an Entity, but not currently used.
